aces.name: Aces Home Improvement
aces.problem: This site needed something modern that looked good on mobile devices, that really showcased the quality work that was being done
aces.solution: Using a simple content management system, I built a site with lots of lightweight graphics and a custom image gallery that will show the work being done in different arenas. Along with the custom design, I created custom hosting that provides 99.9% uptime.
aces.description: Home improvement site, simple contact form, custom image gallery and admin backend

dougblackjr.name: Doug Black
dougblackjr.keywords: HTML5, side scroll, CSS3, mobile-first, responsive
dougblackjr.problem: I needed a landing page that told who I was, and showed what I could do with a keyboard!
dougblackjr.solution: With a simple, side-scrolling design, I created a quick-loading static site with contact form.
dougblackjr.description: Custom site from scratch, simple contact form

ngu.name: Never Give Up
ngu.keywords: HTML5, CSS3, mobile-first, responsive, video background
ngu.problem: NGU's site was outdated, and reflected poorly on the important work this community group was doing. NGU didn't have a ton of money to spend.
ngu.solution: I created a simple static site that would look good on the lowest quality devices, so everyone who needed help could find it. I also provided quality SEO, utilizing JSON-LD, and custom hosting!
ngu.description: Custom site from scratch, created video background

joeritchie.name: Joe Ritchie General Contractor
joeritchie.keywords: HTML5, CSS3, mobile-first, responsive, custom plugin
joeritchie.problem: Joe's site was old, and ran off of an extremely outdated platform. The logo was 100px bitmap that needed to be redone so it would look good at any size.
joeritchie.solution: I made this site to be one page, load quick on all devices, and have a clear call to action. The logo was redone from scratch as a vector, for use on any medium.
joeritchie.description: Custom site from scratch, custom image gallery and contact form

evangel.name: Evangel Assembly of God
evangel.problem: This church had an old, static site that had not been updated in some time. The media took up a huge amount of space and cost way too much. They also needed something simple, so any person from their congregation could be trained to manage it as they deemed fit.
evangel.solution: I created a Wordpress site with a simple, structured backend, and trained individuals in management. I also added some image and audio editing practices and scripts to help manage the size of the site.
evangel.description: Custom Wordpress site, custom theming, added podcast capabilities with recording and automatic audio editing. Trained staff to take over administration

nurseryalert.name: Nursery Alert
nurseryalert.keywords: mobile, app, iOS, Android, Kindle, Windows Phone, Ionic
nurseryalert.problem: My wife and I visited a church, and their super expensive nursery beeper system failed twice. We simply asked: 'Why don't they just text us?'
nurseryalert.solution: I created, built, and marketed a mobile app that would track kids in rooms, and allow workers to notify parents via SMS text with one touch!
